title: Global trade: China warns US not to open 'Pandora's Box'
text:
Global trade: China warns US not to open 'Pandora's Box' Thursday, March 29, 2018 - 01:45 
China warned the United States on Thursday not to open a Pandora's Box and spark a flurry of protectionist practices across the globe, even as Beijing pointed to U.S. goods that it could target in a deepening Sino-U.S. trade dispute. David Pollard reports.
